title: There's An Ongoing Psy-Op Against You (Ep 1728)
description:
The government, members of the intelligence community, and media hacks are ALL running a massive psy-op against us. In this episode I address the massive scandal. 

News Picks:

The media hid the Hunter Biden laptop story to rig the 2020 election. 


Major report on Hunter Biden drops, and the hack media faceplants again. 


Republicans should run on the culture war, it’s a recipe for victory. 

Polls show that Biden’s green energy suicide pact is grossly unpopular.

Is the Russian military about to turn on Putin?
